title: 198: Optimizing Your Stress Response with Dr. Greg Kelly
description:
How do you do manage your stress response for higher brain performance? 

You might be surprised to find out the relief that can come from simple decision making, endurance building, and good sleep.  

Today I’m excited to welcome back our special guest, Dr. Greg Kelly. He is a Naturopathic Physician (N.D.), lead product formulator, and author. 

In this episode, Dr. Greg uses the analogy of “the straw that broke the camel’s back” to help us understand how stress works in our lives. There are ways to remove straws from our buckets that allow us to manage the stresses of life in a healthier way.

*** Do you want to stay up to date with every new episode and get my brand new Kwik Brain Accelerator Program? Go to www.KwikBrain.com/podcast to get instant access. ***
